solution_line_template: He biked for {bike_ride_distance} miles and went {total_distance_all_day} miles in all, so he walked and ran {total_distance_all_day} - {bike_ride_distance} = <<{total_distance_all_day}-{bike_ride_distance}={walk_and_run_total}>>{walk_and_run_total} miles.
Thus, his walk and run together were X + {walk_multiplier_val}X = {combined_coefficient}X = <<{walk_and_run_total}={walk_and_run_total}>>{walk_and_run_total} miles.
